document.full_text: as lawmakers combed the budget this year for possible cuts, some leaders focused on the windham school district, which received more than $128 million to provide education to inmates.
document.title: the texas tribune: lawmakers and others discuss changes to education programs for prisoners
lines_and_colors: as lawmakers combed the budget this year for possible cuts, some leaders focused on the windham school district, which received more than $128 million to provide education to inmates.
